Package games.spheregame.model

Class PathedNode

java.lang.Object
games.spheregame.model.Node
games.spheregame.model.PathedNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
games.spheregame.model.INode, java.lang.Comparable<games.spheregame.model.INode>
public class PathedNode
extends games.spheregame.model.Node
This Class extends the abstract Node)
It contains the logic for a Pathed Noded,a node that has a list of all the "states" between the root and reaching this node.
Author:
Kostas
